ocean.question: I swim in the ocean and I'm very colorful. Nemo is one of me! What am I?
I have a shell and I move very slowly on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🐌 I'm a kind of snail that lives in the sea

ocean.question: I am big and blue, and whales swim in me. What am I?
I have eight arms and live in the ocean. Who am I?

hints.text: 🪨 I like to hide in caves.

ocean.question: I am very small and live in a shell on the beach. You can hear the ocean if you hold me to your ear. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I'm often found on the sand.
🏡 Crabs sometimes live in me when they get bigger.

ocean.question: I have a big mouth and lots of sharp teeth. I swim in the ocean and some people are scared of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a type of fish.

ocean.question: I am a very big animal that lives in the ocean. I sing songs and have a blowhole. What am I?

hints.text: 🌬️ I breathe through a hole on my head.
🎶 I make sounds in the water.

ocean.question: I am a colorful starfish-shaped animal that lives deep in the ocean and can regenerate limbs. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 If I lose an arm, it can grow back.

ocean.question: I am a large, plant-like structure in the ocean that provides homes for many fish and animals. What am I?
I am a creature of the deep sea. I have a light on my head to attract prey. What am I?

hints.text: 🔦 My light helps me see in the dark.

cosmos.question: I am big and bright and come out at night. I shine with borrowed light! What am I?

hints.text: ⚪ I am round like a ball.
🐺 Sometimes you see me with werewolves!
🧀 Some people think I am made of cheese!

cosmos.question: I am very big and very hot. I give Earth light a lot! What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You can't look straight at me!

cosmos.question: I am a little ball that goes around the sun, Earth is one! What am I?
I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 📜 Ancient Greeks named many of us.

cosmos.question: I am a very, very big group of stars, gas, and dust. I am so big it's hard to trust! What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I am shaped like a spiral.
🌌 I have lots of stars inside.
🥛 Earth is a small part of me.

cosmos.question: I am a ball of ice and dust that flies around the Sun. I have a tail sometimes, that is so fun! What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of frozen stuff.
☄️ I only visit the inner solar system every now and then.
💨 My tail always points away from the Sun.

cosmos.question: I'm a rocky object orbiting the sun. I am smaller than a planet but bigger than a grain of sand, for some, I am quite grand! What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 I live in a belt between Mars and Jupiter.

cosmos.question: I am a shooting star, a rock from space, that burns bright as I race. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I burn up in the air.
✨ Make a wish when you see me!

cosmos.question: I am the force that keeps everything from floating away, from you to the stars I make everything stay! What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 An apple falling from a tree can show you me.
🌎 I keep you on the ground.

cosmos.question: I am a place where nothing, not even light, can escape. I am super dense, and shaped like a drape! What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I am the end of a star's life.
